title: GCSE results: pupils in England bounce back from pandemic as top grades rise
description: Proportion awarded grades 7 or above up on last year despite concerns over Covid era’s impact on cohort
content:
Pupils in England who were thought to have been among the worst affected by Covid have bounced back in their GCSE results with more achieving top grades despite the disruption of the pandemic.

title: Man Utd: Harry Maguire says club 'in completely different place'
description: Manchester United defender Harry Maguire says he would be "silly" to leave a club he feels are on the up.
content:
Manchester United blocked any chance of Harry Maguire leaving the club this summer - but the defender feels it would be "silly" to want to quit now anyway.
United triggered an option on Maguire's contract in January, keeping him at Old Trafford for a... [2132 chars]

title: It’s taken 14 years and £67.5m, but Eberechi Eze is going back to Arsenal
description: Eberechi Eze was released by Arsenal aged 13 and rejected by other clubs before his breakthrough at QPR
